New Features

  • Adds points of interests

Fixes and Improvements

  • Includes important updates to third-party software dependencies

Known Issues

  • Selecting a category does not reveal points of interests currently
  • After creating an item, it is not automatically selected
  • When creating a new item, the Title Prefix text field is focused instead of the Title text field
  • When creating a new item from the File → New menu, the currently selected items are not used as defaults for the new item. Use the Create Item menu in the toolbar instead
  • The New Location window is initially narrower than intended

New Features

  • Added categories

Fixes and Improvements

  • Improved the listing of areas: area groups, followed by a section for each group that lists all areas contained in it, followed by all areas that are not assigned to an area group
  • Empty list section are now hidden

Known Issues

  • After creating an item, it is not automatically selected
  • When creating a new item, the Title Prefix text field is focused instead of the Title text field
  • When creating a new item from the File → New menu, the currently selected items are not used as defaults for the new item. Use the Create Item menu in the toolbar instead
  • The New Location window is initially narrower than intended

Fixes and Improvements

  • Improved the inspector layout by properly aligning labels and controls
  • The current selection is retained after saving changes
  • The currently selected item is now used for the window/tab title
  • (Hopefully) fixed a bug that prevented over-the-air updates from being installed

Known Issues

  • After creating an item, it is not automatically selected
  • When creating a new item, the Title Prefix text field is focused instead of the Title text field
  • When creating a new item from the File → New menu, the currently selected items are not used as defaults for the new item. Use the Create Item menu in the toolbar instead
  • The New Location window is initially narrower than intended
